All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CacheEntry
Represents a cache entry that stores file content along with its last access time.
CacheManager
Manages a thread-safe in-memory cache using a reader-writer pattern.
CacheManagerSingleton
Singleton class that provides a single shared instance of CacheManager, using the Singleton Pattern.
FileMonitor
Ensures exclusive, FIFO-based access to individual files using per-file locks.
FileService
A thread-based file reader that handles file access with concurrency and caching.
HeaderBuilder
A thread that builds standard HTTP response headers.
Logger
A background logging thread that asynchronously processes log messages from a shared buffer.
LoggingTask
Represents a single log task containing all necessary information to be logged.
LogLocation
Represents the output destination for a log message.
LogProducer
Marker interface for classes that generate log messages.
LogType
Represents the severity or category of a log message.
Main
Entry point of the web server application.
MainHTTPServerThread
A simple multithreaded HTTP server that listens on a specified port and serves files from a configured root directory.
RequestHandler
Handles a single HTTP request from a connected client.
RequestValidator
A thread that validates the structure of an incoming HTTP request.
ServerConfig
Handles loading and accessing server settings from the config file.
SharedBuffer
Shared interface containing a global blocking queue for logging tasks.
ThreadPool
A thread pool that manages a fixed number of worker threads to execute tasks.
WorkerThread
A worker thread that continuously executes tasks from a shared task queue.
